message:
#Repost @rescueher
・・・
Did you know that around 60% of all child sex trafficking victims have histories in the child welfare system? We work with adults and almost half of the women we work with were in the foster care system and aged out. Children without families to make them feel loved, cared for, and protected are particularly vulnerable to exploitation by traffickers. 💔
This adorable coffee shop just opened up in Dallas, TX and employees youth that have aged out of the foster care system. Jobs are a huge barrier for the women we work with for many reasons. This is a huge step in the right direction and we can’t wait to see the positive impact this establishment will have in decreasing the trafficking stats for these individuals in our area! 🙌🏻
Thank you @lalalandkindcafe for joining the fight in a unique way! We appreciate you! ❤️
#togetherforfreedom #fortheONE #dallas
